comments:
Build id: 200212101101
When I close Eclipse with some editors open, in the next start Eclipse cannot 
show those editors, and the .log file contains the following Exception:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 2 dec. 11, 2002 13:18:31.660
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".
!STACK 0

I think I have found the problem in EditorWorkbook.createControl. First there 
is a code tagged with comment 'Create tabs' and after that is another 
part 'Create the pulldown menu on the CTabFolder' but createTabs uses the 
pulldown menu so it is creates the NPE. I tried to simply change the order of 
those two construct and the error has gone. I do not know however this order-
change can introduce another defects.

Csaba
